Author: downer
Content: Another data point that fits the theory.

Author: staunch
Content: Reliability, consistency, simplicity, etc I imagine. A human can probably do hundreds an hour, so the cost is probably $0.01/ticket. They're surely earning a hell of a lot more than that per ticket.
